explains: n. 共有人；共同所有人

sentences.en: Morgan was a co-owner of the club.
sentences.cn: 摩根是这家俱乐部的共同拥有人。

sentences.en: Crowe is also co-owner of National Rugby League team the South Sydney Rabbitohs.
sentences.cn: 克劳同时也是澳大利亚国家橄榄球联盟和南悉尼rabbitohs橄榄球队的共同拥有者。

sentences.en: "The roof garden definitely helps us rent the offices out," says Charlie Green, co-owner of the company.
sentences.cn: “楼顶花园显然可以帮助我们把办公室租赁出去，”公司老板查理·格林说。
